feature_model.name: Virtual_Office_of_the_Future

meta.data: This model captures a common view of an organization’s future and specifies the type of products, as well as the space of features and their variations, that should be supported by a reuse infrastructure.
Jaejoon Lee and Dirk Muthig. Feature-oriented variability management in product line engineering. Communications of the ACM, 49(12):55–59, 2006.

feature_model.feature_tree: :r vof :o undefined_on_paper :m follow_me :o undefined_on_paper :m user_localize :m user_pos_method :g [1,1] : access_point : rfid :m logon :o undefined_on_paper :o virtual_printer :m printer_register :m file_upload :o file_converter
